channel.title: Home on Victor Alves
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Victor Alves

item.title: About
item.description:
I am Victor Alves, an economist from Brazil with strong interests in economic theory, public policy, inequality, applied econometrics, and the intersection between quantitative analysis and real-world problems.

I completed my undergraduate studies with a full scholarship at a top institution, and I am currently preparing for graduate-level research in economics. My goal is to produce work that bridges rigorous economic modeling with questions relevant to social welfare, institutions, and development.
item.content:encoded:
I am Victor Alves, an economist from Brazil with strong interests in economic theory, public policy, inequality, applied econometrics, and the intersection between quantitative analysis and real-world problems.

I completed my undergraduate studies with a full scholarship at a top institution, and I am currently preparing for graduate-level research in economics. My goal is to produce work that bridges rigorous economic modeling with questions relevant to social welfare, institutions, and development.

Beyond economics, I am deeply interested in academic communication, teaching, and the democratization of knowledge through high-quality study materials.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
If you would like to get in touch, feel free to use any of the channels below:

  • Email: SEUEMAIL
  • GitHub: https://github.com/SEU_GITHUB
  • LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/SEU_LINKEDIN
  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/SEU_TWITTER
  • Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/SEU_BLUESKY

I am always open to discussing research, academic collaborations, or study-related topics.

item.title: Research
item.description:
My research interests include:

  • Economic Theory
  • Public Economics
  • Inequality and Social Policy
  • Applied Econometrics
  • Development Economics

Drafts, working papers, and research notes will be posted here as they become available.
item.content:encoded:
My research interests include:

  • Economic Theory
  • Public Economics
  • Inequality and Social Policy
  • Applied Econometrics
  • Development Economics

Drafts, working papers, and research notes will be posted here as they become available.

item.title: Study Materials
item.description:
Here I share study notes, problem sets, explanations, and resources I have created over time—especially in economics, mathematics, data analysis, and econometrics.

Materials will be added soon.
